trans-unit.source: A helper node, mostly used in 3rd person cameras.

trans-unit.source: A high value makes the material appear more like a metal. Non-metals use their albedo as the diffuse color and add diffuse to the specular reflection. With non-metals, the reflection appears on top of the albedo color. Metals use their albedo as a multiplier to the specular reflection and set the diffuse color to black resulting in a tinted reflection. Materials work better when fully metal or fully non-metal, values between 0 and 1 should only be used for blending between metal and non-metal sections. To alter the amount of reflection use roughness.
trans-unit.target: 较高的值使材料看起来更像金属。非金属将其反照率用作漫反射颜色，并将漫反射添加到镜面反射中。对于非金属，反射会出现在反照率颜色的顶部。金属将其反射率用作镜面反射的倍增器，并将漫反射颜色设置为黑色，从而产生着色反射。当使用全金属或非金属材料时，材料会更好地工作， 0 和 1 之间的值仅应用于金属和非金属部分之间的混合。要更改反射量，请使用粗糙度。

trans-unit.source: A high-level network interface to simplify multiplayer interactions.
trans-unit.target: 一个高级网络接口,以简化多人互动。

trans-unit.source: A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the bottom border of the 3×3 box.
trans-unit.target: 较高的值意味着更多的源纹理被视为3×3框底部边框的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A limiter is similar to a compressor, but it’s less flexible and designed to disallow sound going over a given dB threshold. Adding one in the Master Bus is always recommended to reduce the effects of clipping.
trans-unit.target: 限制器类似于压缩器，但灵活性较差，并且设计为不允许声音超过给定的dB阈值。始终建议在主总线中添加一个以减少裁剪的影响。

trans-unit.source: A limiter is similar to a compressor, but it's less flexible and designed to disallow sound going over a given dB threshold. Adding one in the Master bus is always recommended to reduce the effects of clipping.
trans-unit.target: 限幅器类似于压缩器,但它的灵活性较低,旨在禁止声音超过给定的dB阈值。建议在主母线上增加一个,以减少削波的影响。

trans-unit.source: A negative value will result in the vehicle reversing.

trans-unit.source: A pre-parsed relative or absolute path in a scene tree, for use with Node.get_node and similar functions. It can reference a node, a resource within a node, or a property of a node or resource. For instance, "Path2D/PathFollow2D/Sprite:texture:size" would refer to the size property of the texture resource on the node named "Sprite" which is a child of the other named nodes in the path.
trans-unit.target: 场景树中预先解析的相对或绝对路径，用于Node.get_node和类似功能。它可以引用节点，节点内的资源或节点或资源的属性。例如， "Path2D/PathFollow2D/Sprite:texture:size" 将引用名为 "Sprite" 的节点上 texture 资源的 size 属性，该节点是路径中其他命名节点的子级。

trans-unit.source: A preview that will follow the mouse that should represent the data can be set with set_drag_preview. A good time to set the preview is in this method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用set_drag_preview设置将跟随鼠标的预览，该预览将代表数据。设置预览的好时机是这种方法。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression (or regex) is a compact language that can be used to recognise strings that follow a specific pattern, such as URLs, email addresses, complete sentences, etc. For instance, a regex of ab[0-9] would find any string that is ab followed by any number from 0 to 9. For a more in-depth look, you can easily find various tutorials and detailed explanations on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式（或正则表达式）是一种紧凑型语言，可用于识别遵循特定模式的字符串，例如URL，电子邮件地址，完整的句子等。例如， ab[0-9] 的正则表达式会发现任何 ab 的字符串，后跟 0 到 9 之间的任何数字。要更深入地了解，可以在Internet上轻松找到各种教程和详细说明。

trans-unit.target: 在环境中引用的用于绘制背景的资源。全景天空的功能类似于其他引擎中的天空盒，不同之处在于它使用等角矩形的天空图而不是立方体图。

trans-unit.source: A resource to add to an AnimationNodeBlendTree. Only features one output set using the animation property. Use it as an input for AnimationNode that blend animations together.

trans-unit.source: A resource to add to an AnimationNodeBlendTree. This node will execute a sub-animation and return once it finishes. Blend times for fading in and out can be customized, as well as filters.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到AnimationNodeBlendTree的资源。该节点将执行子动画处理，并在完成后返回。淡入和淡出的混合时间以及过滤器都可以自定义。

trans-unit.source: A singleton that deals with inputs. This includes key presses, mouse buttons and movement, joypads, and input actions. Actions and their events can be set in the Input Map tab in the Project > Project Settings, or with the InputMap class.

trans-unit.target: 一个空间节点代表一个空间跟踪的控制器。

trans-unit.source: A spotlight, such as a reflector spotlight or a lantern.

trans-unit.source: A static body can also be animated by using simulated motion mode. This is useful for implementing functionalities such as moving platforms. When this mode is active the body can be animated and automatically computes linear and angular velocity to apply in that frame and to influence other bodies.
trans-unit.target: 静态体也可以通过使用模拟运动模式来制作动画。这对于实现移动平台等功能非常有用。当该模式激活时,体可以被动画化,并自动计算线性和角速度以应用于该帧并影响其他体。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization Mutex.
trans-unit.target: 一个同步Mutex。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization Mutex. Element used to synchronize multiple Threads. Basically a binary Semaphore. Guarantees that only one thread can ever acquire this lock at a time. Can be used to protect a critical section. Be careful to avoid deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: 同步Mutex。用于同步多个Thread的元素。基本上是二进制信号量。确保一次只有一个线程可以获取此锁。可用于保护关键部分。小心避免死锁。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization Semaphore.
trans-unit.target: 一个同步的Semaphore。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization Semaphore. Element used to synchronize multiple Threads. Initialized to zero on creation. Be careful to avoid deadlocks. For a binary version, see Mutex.
trans-unit.target: 同步信号量。用于同步多个Thread的元素。创建时初始化为零。小心避免死锁。有关二进制版本，请参见Mutex。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization mutex (mutual exclusion).
trans-unit.target: 同步互斥(互斥)。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization mutex (mutual exclusion). This is used to synchronize multiple Threads, and is equivalent to a binary Semaphore. It guarantees that only one thread can ever acquire the lock at a time. A mutex can be used to protect a critical section; however, be careful to avoid deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: 同步互斥（互斥）。这用于同步多个Thread，等效于二进制Semaphore。它保证了一次只能有一个线程获得该锁。互斥锁可用于保护关键部分。但是，请小心避免死锁。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization semaphore which can be used to synchronize multiple Threads. Initialized to zero on creation. Be careful to avoid deadlocks. For a binary version, see Mutex.
trans-unit.target: 同步信号量，可用于同步多个Thread。创建时初始化为零。小心避免死锁。有关二进制版本，请参见Mutex。

trans-unit.source: A tree of nodes is called a scene. Scenes can be saved to the disk and then instanced into other scenes. This allows for very high flexibility in the architecture and data model of Godot projects.

trans-unit.source: A weak reference to an object is not enough to keep the object alive: when the only remaining references to a referent are weak references, garbage collection is free to destroy the referent and reuse its memory for something else. However, until the object is actually destroyed the weak reference may return the object even if there are no strong references to it.
trans-unit.target: 对一个对象的弱引用不足以让这个对象存活下去:当对一个引用的唯一剩余引用是弱引用时,垃圾回收可以自由地销毁这个引用,并将它的内存重新用于其他东西。然而,在对象真正被销毁之前,即使没有强引用,弱引用也可以返回对象。

trans-unit.source: A weakref can hold a Reference, without contributing to the reference counter. A weakref can be created from an Object using @GDScript.weakref. If this object is not a reference, weakref still works, however, it does not have any effect on the object. Weakrefs are useful in cases where multiple classes have variables that refer to each other. Without weakrefs, using these classes could lead to memory leaks, since both references keep each other from being released. Making part of the variables a weakref can prevent this cyclic dependency, and allows the references to be released.
trans-unit.target: 弱引用可以保存引用，而无需增加引用计数器。可以使用@ GDScript.weakref从对象创建一个weakref。如果该对象不是引用，则weakref仍然有效，但是，它对该对象没有任何影响。在多个类具有相互引用的变量的情况下，弱引用很有用。如果没有weakrefs，则使用这些类可能会导致内存泄漏，因为两个引用会使彼此不被释放。将变量的一部分设为weakref可以防止这种循环依赖性，并允许释放引用。

trans-unit.source: A* (A star) is a computer algorithm that is widely used in pathfinding and graph traversal, the process of plotting an efficiently directed path between multiple points. It enjoys widespread use due to its performance and accuracy. Godot’s A* implementation make use of vectors as points.
trans-unit.target: A *（星形）是一种计算机算法，广泛用于路径查找和图形遍历，该过程是绘制多个点之间有效指向的路径的过程。由于其性能和准确性，它得到了广泛的应用。Godot的A *实现使用向量作为点。

trans-unit.source: A* (A star) is a computer algorithm that is widely used in pathfinding and graph traversal, the process of plotting short paths among vertices (points), passing through a given set of edges (segments). It enjoys widespread use due to its performance and accuracy. Godot's A* implementation uses points in three-dimensional space and Euclidean distances by default.
trans-unit.target: A*(A star)是一种计算机算法,广泛用于路径查找和图遍历,即在顶点(点)之间绘制短路径,通过一组给定的边(段)的过程。由于它的性能和准确性,它得到了广泛的应用。Godot的A*实现默认使用三维空间中的点和欧几里得距离。

trans-unit.source: Accelerates the vehicle by applying an engine force. The vehicle is only speed up if the wheels that have VehicleWheel.use_as_traction set to true and are in contact with a surface. The RigidBody.mass of the vehicle has an effect on the acceleration of the vehicle. For a vehicle with a mass set to 1000, try a value in the 25 - 50 range for acceleration.
trans-unit.target: 通过施加发动机力来加速车辆。仅当将VehicleWheel.use_as_traction设置为 true 并与表面接触的车轮时，车辆才会加速。车辆的RigidBody.mass质量会影响车辆的加速度。对于质量设置为1000的车辆，请尝试在25-50范围内的值进行加速。

trans-unit.source: Accelerates the vehicle by applying an engine force. The vehicle is only speed up if the wheels that have VehicleWheel.use_as_traction set to true and are in contact with a surface. The RigidBody.mass of the vehicle has an effect on the acceleration of the vehicle. For a vehicle with a mass set to 1000, try a value in the 25 - 50 range for acceleration. Note that the simulation does not take the effect of gears into account, you will need to add logic for this if you wish to simulate gears.
trans-unit.target: 通过施加发动机力来加速车辆。仅当将VehicleWheel.use_as_traction设置为 true 并与表面接触的车轮时，车辆才会加速。车辆的RigidBody.mass质量会影响车辆的加速度。对于质量设置为1000的车辆，请尝试在25-50范围内的值进行加速。请注意，模拟并未考虑齿轮的影响，如果要模拟齿轮，则需要为此添加逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Accelerates the wheel by applying an engine force. The wheel is only speed up if it is in contact with a surface. The RigidBody.mass of the vehicle has an effect on the acceleration of the vehicle. For a vehicle with a mass set to 1000, try a value in the 25 - 50 range for acceleration.
trans-unit.target: 通过施加引擎力来加速车轮。轮子仅在与表面接触时才加速。车辆的RigidBody.mass质量会影响车辆的加速度。对于质量设置为1000的车辆，请尝试在25-50范围内的值进行加速。

trans-unit.source: Add a custom Visual Script node to the editor. It’ll be placed under “Custom Nodes” with the category as the parameter.

trans-unit.source: Add collision triangles to the gizmo for picking. A TriangleMesh can be generated from a regular Mesh too. Call this function during redraw.

trans-unit.source: Add color region (given the delimiters) and its colors.
trans-unit.target: 添加颜色区域(给定定界符)及其颜色。

trans-unit.source: Add lines to the gizmo (as sets of 2 points), with a given material. The lines are used for visualizing the gizmo. Call this function during redraw.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的材质将线添加到Gizmo（以2点为一组）。这些线用于可视化Gizmo。重绘时调用此函数。

trans-unit.target: 为将与add_surface_from_arrays添加的混合形状添加名称。必须在添加曲面之前调用。

trans-unit.source: Add particle system to list of particle systems that need to be updated. Update will take place on the next frame, or on the next call to instances_cull_aabb, instances_cull_convex, or instances_cull_ray.
trans-unit.target: 将粒子系统添加到需要更新的粒子系统列表中。更新将在下一帧或下一次对instances_cull_aabb，instances_cull_convex或instances_cull_ray的调用时进行。

trans-unit.source: Add the control to a specific dock slot (see DOCK_* enum for options).

trans-unit.source: Add/Remove a path for the filter.

trans-unit.source: Added padding applied to the bounding box when using invert. Setting this value too small may result in a "Bad Polygon" error.
trans-unit.target: 使用 invert 时，已将填充添加到边框。将此值设置得太小可能会导致“多边形错误”错误。

trans-unit.source: Added padding applied to the bounding box when using invert. Setting this value too small may result in a “Bad Polygon” error. Default value: 100.
trans-unit.target: 使用 invert 时，已将填充添加到边框。将此值设置得太小可能会导致“多边形错误”错误。默认值： 100 。

trans-unit.source: Adding an index array puts this function into "index mode" where the vertex and other arrays become the sources of data, and the index array defines the order of the vertices.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个索引数组使该函数进入 "索引模式",在该模式下,顶点和其他数组成为数据的来源,而索引数组定义了顶点的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Adding an index array puts this function into “index mode” where the vertex and other arrays become the sources of data, and the index array defines the order of the vertices.
trans-unit.target: 添加索引数组会使此函数进入“索引模式”，在该模式下，顶点和其他数组成为数据源，并且索引数组定义了顶点的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, a constant linear or angular velocity can be set for the static body, so even if it doesn't move, it affects other bodies as if it was moving (this is useful for simulating conveyor belts or conveyor wheels).
trans-unit.target: 此外,还可以为静止的物体设置一个恒定的线速度或角速度,这样即使它不移动,也会像移动一样影响其他物体(这对模拟传送带或传送轮很有用)。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, a constant linear or angular velocity can be set for the static body, which will affect colliding bodies as if it were moving (for example, a conveyor belt).
trans-unit.target: 此外,还可以为静止体设置一个恒定的线速度或角速度,这将对碰撞体产生影响,就像它在移动一样(例如,传送带)。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the attributes used before the first vertex is added determine the format of the mesh. For example if you only add UVs to the first vertex, you cannot add color to any of the subsequent vertices.
trans-unit.target: 此外,在添加第一个顶点之前使用的属性决定了网格的格式。例如,如果你只给第一个顶点添加UV,你就不能给后续的任何顶点添加颜色。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the attributes used before the first vertex is added determine the format of the mesh. For example, if you only add UVs to the first vertex, you cannot add color to any of the subsequent vertices.
trans-unit.target: 此外,在添加第一个顶点之前使用的属性决定了网格的格式。例如,如果你只给第一个顶点添加UV,就不能给后续的任何顶点添加颜色。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the method can take an exclude array of objects or RIDs that are to be excluded from collisions, a collision_mask bitmask representing the physics layers to check in, or booleans to determine if the ray should collide with PhysicsBodys or Areas, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该方法可以采用要从碰撞中 exclude 的对象或RID的排除数组，代表要检入的物理层的 collision_mask 位掩码或布尔值以确定射线是否应分别与PhysicsBody或Area碰撞。 。

trans-unit.source: Address of the local machine in the network connecting it to this UPNPDevice.
trans-unit.target: 将本地计算机连接到此UPNPDevice的网络中的本地计算机的地址。

trans-unit.source: Adds a PoolVector2Array that contains the vertices of an outline to the internal array that contains all the outlines at a fixed position. You have to call make_polygons_from_outlines in order for this array to be converted to polygons that the engine will use.

trans-unit.source: Adds a button with Texturebutton at column column. The button_idx index is used to identify the button when calling other methods. trans-unit.source: Adds a child node. Nodes can have any number of children, but every child must have a unique name. Child nodes are automatically deleted when the parent node is deleted, so an entire scene can be removed by deleting its topmost node.

trans-unit.source: Adds a control to the bottom panel (together with Output, Debug, Animation, etc). Returns a reference to the button added. It's up to you to hide/show the button when needed. When your plugin is deactivated, make sure to remove your custom control with remove_control_from_bottom_panel and free it with Node.queue_free.
trans-unit.target: 将控件添加到底部面板（以及“输出”，“调试”，“动画”等）。返回对添加的按钮的引用。您可以根据需要隐藏/显示按钮。停用插件后，请确保使用remove_control_from_bottom_panel删除自定义控件，并使用Node.queue_free将其释放。

trans-unit.source: Adds a control to the box as a spacer. If true, begin will insert the spacer control in front of other children.
trans-unit.target: 将控件添加到框作为间隔。如果为 true ，则 begin 将spacer控件插入其他孩子的前面。

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom control, not necessarily a property editor.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个自定义控件,不一定是属性编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property info to a property. The dictionary must contain:
trans-unit.target: 为一个属性添加一个自定义属性信息。字典必须包含:

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property info to a property. The dictionary must contain: name:String(the property’s name) and type:int(see TYPE_* in @GlobalScope), and optionally hint:int(see PROPERTY_HINT_* in @GlobalScope), hint_string:String.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义属性信息添加到属性。字典必须包含：姓名：字符串（属性的名称），然后键入：INT（见TYPE_ *在@GlobalScope），以及可选提示：INT（见PROPERTY_HINT_ *在@GlobalScope），hint_string：字符串。

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom submenu under Project > Tools >name. submenu should be an object of class PopupMenu. This submenu should be cleaned up using remove_tool_menu_item(name).
trans-unit.target: 在“项目”>“工具”>“ name 下添加一个自定义子菜单。 submenu 应该是类PopupMenu的对象。应该使用 remove_tool_menu_item(name) 清理此子菜单。

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom type, which will appear in the list of nodes or resources. An icon can be optionally passed.

trans-unit.source: Adds a mapping to forward the external port (between 1 and 65535) on the default gateway (see get_gateway) to the internal_port on the local machine for the given protocol proto (either TCP or UDP, with UDP being the default). If a port mapping for the given port and protocol combination already exists on that gateway device, this method tries to overwrite it. If that is not desired, you can retrieve the gateway manually with get_gateway and call add_port_mapping on it, if any.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个映射，以将默认网关（请参阅get_gateway）上的外部 port （请参阅get_gateway）转发到本地计算机上针对给定协议 proto （ TCP 或 UDP ，默认为UDP ）的 internal_port 。如果该网关设备上已经存在给定端口和协议组合的端口映射，则此方法将尝试覆盖它。如果不需要，可以使用get_gateway手动检索网关，并在其上调用add_port_mapping。

trans-unit.target: 将具有指定 billboard 状态， skeleton 和 material 的网格添加到Gizmo 。如果 billboard 为 true ，则网格将旋转以始终面向相机。重绘时调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Adds a positioned force to the applied force and torque. As with body_apply_impulse, both the force and the offset from the body origin are in global coordinates. A force differs from an impulse in that, while the two are forces, the impulse clears itself after being applied.

trans-unit.source: Adds the node to a group. Groups are helpers to name and organize a subset of nodes, for example "enemies" or "collectables". A node can be in any number of groups. trans-unit.target: Adjustments

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the rate at which the effect sweeps up and down across the frequency range.
trans-unit.target: 调整效果在整个频率范围内上下扫描的速度。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the rate in Hz at which the effect sweeps up and down across the frequency range.
trans-unit.target: 以Hz为单位调整效果在整个频率范围内上下扫描的速度。

trans-unit.source: Affine operations (rotate, scale, translate) happen in parent’s local coordinate system, unless the Spatial object is set as top level. Affine operations in this coordinate system correspond to direct affine operations on the Spatial’s transform. The word local below refers to this coordinate system. The coordinate system that is attached to the Spatial object itself is referred to as object-local coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 仿射操作（旋转，缩放，平移）发生在父级的本地坐标系中，除非将 Spatial 对象设置为顶级。此坐标系中的仿射运算对应于 Spatial 变换上的直接仿射运算。下面的“局部”一词是指该坐标系。附加到 Spatial 对象本身的坐标系称为对象局部坐标系。

trans-unit.source: Affine operations (rotate, scale, translate) happen in parent's local coordinate system, unless the Spatial object is set as top-level. Affine operations in this coordinate system correspond to direct affine operations on the Spatial's transform. The word local below refers to this coordinate system. The coordinate system that is attached to the Spatial object itself is referred to as object-local coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 仿射操作（旋转，缩放，平移）发生在父级的本地坐标系中，除非将 Spatial 对象设置为顶级。此坐标系中的仿射运算对应于 Spatial 变换上的直接仿射运算。下面的“局部”一词是指该坐标系。附加到 Spatial 对象本身的坐标系称为对象局部坐标系。

trans-unit.source: After adding at least one child to GraphNode new sections will be automatically created in the Inspector called 'Slot'. When 'Slot' is expanded you will see list with index number for each slot. You can click on each of them to expand further.
trans-unit.target: 在向 GraphNode 添加至少一个子节点后,将在 Inspector 中自动创建名为 "Slot "的新部分。展开'槽'后,你会看到每个槽的索引号列表。您可以点击其中的每一个槽来进一步展开。

trans-unit.source: After calling this function the peer will start emitting ice_candidate_created (unless an Error different from @GlobalScope.OK is returned).
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数后，对等方将开始发出ice_candidate_created（除非返回不同于@ GlobalScope.OK的错误）。

trans-unit.source: After editing a font (changing size, ascent, char rects, etc.). Call this function to propagate changes to controls that might use it.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑字体后(改变大小、上升、字符直角等)。调用此函数将更改传播给可能使用它的控件。

trans-unit.source: After initializing the interface you want to use you then need to enable the AR/VR mode of a viewport and rendering should commence.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化你想要使用的界面后,你就需要启用视口的AR/VR模式,渲染应该开始了。

trans-unit.source: After starting the client (connect_to_url), you will need to NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.poll it at regular intervals (e.g. inside Node._process).
trans-unit.target: 启动客户端（connect_to_url）之后，您将需要定期（例如在Node._process内部）对NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.poll进行轮询。

trans-unit.source: After starting the server (listen), you will need to poll it at regular intervals (e.g. inside Node._process) for it to process new packets, delivering them to the appropriate PacketPeerUDP, and taking new connections.
trans-unit.target: 启动服务器（侦听）后，您将需要定期轮询（例如，在Node._process内部）以处理新数据包，将其传送到适当的PacketPeerUDP并建立新连接。

trans-unit.source: After starting the server (listen), you will need to NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.poll it at regular intervals (e.g. inside Node._process). When clients connect, disconnect, or send data, you will receive the appropriate signal.
trans-unit.target: 启动服务器（侦听）后，您需要定期对NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.poll进行轮询（例如，在Node._process内部）。当客户端连接，断开连接或发送数据时，您将收到适当的信号。

trans-unit.source: After these steps, the connection should become connected. Keep on reading or look into the tutorial for more information.
trans-unit.target: 经过这些步骤后,应该就可以连接了。继续阅读或查看教程了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: All User Interface nodes inherit from Control. A control’s anchors and margins adapt its position and size relative to its parent.

trans-unit.source: All built-in editor gizmos return a priority of -1. If not overridden, this method will return 0, which means custom gizmos will automatically override built-in gizmos.
trans-unit.target: 所有内置编辑器小控件都返回 -1 的优先级。如果未重写，则此方法将返回 0 ，这意味着自定义控件将自动覆盖内置控件。

trans-unit.source: All data is packed in one large float array. An array may look like this: Transform for instance 1, color data for instance 1, custom data for instance 1, transform for instance 2, color data for instance 2, etc.
trans-unit.target: 所有的数据都打包在一个大的浮动数组中。一个数组可能是这样的。实例1的变换数据,实例1的颜色数据,实例1的自定义数据,实例2的变换数据,实例2的颜色数据,等等。

trans-unit.source: All data is packed in one large float array. An array may look like this: Transform for instance 1, color data for instance 1, custom data for instance 1, transform for instance 2, color data for instance 2, etc...
trans-unit.target: 所有的数据都打包在一个大的浮动数组中。一个数组可能是这样的。实例1的变换,实例1的颜色数据,实例1的自定义数据,实例2的变换,实例2的颜色数据,等等......。

trans-unit.source: All objects are drawn to a viewport. You can use the Viewport attached to the SceneTree or you can create one yourself with viewport_create. When using a custom scenario or canvas, the scenario or canvas needs to be attached to the viewport using viewport_set_scenario or viewport_attach_canvas.
trans-unit.target: 所有对象均绘制到视口。您可以使用附加到SceneTree的视口，也可以使用viewport_create自己创建一个视口。使用自定义方案或画布时，需要使用viewport_set_scenario或viewport_attach_canvas将方案或画布附加到视口。

trans-unit.source: All user interface nodes inherit from Control. A control's anchors and margins adapt its position and size relative to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 所有的用户界面节点都继承自Control。控件的锚点和边距可以调整其相对于父节点的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: Allocates space for the multimesh data. Format parameters determine how the data will be stored by OpenGL. See MultimeshTransformFormat, MultimeshColorFormat, and MultimeshCustomDataFormat for usage. Equivalent to MultiMesh.instance_count.
trans-unit.target: 为多网格数据分配空间。格式参数确定OpenGL如何存储数据。有关用法，请参见MultimeshTransformFormat，MultimeshColorFormat和MultimeshCustomDataFormat。等效于MultiMesh.instance_count。

trans-unit.source: Allocates the GPU buffers for this skeleton.
trans-unit.target: 为这个骨架分配GPU缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Allocates the GPU memory for the texture.
trans-unit.target: 为纹理分配GPU内存。

trans-unit.source: Allow or disallow selection of the item associated with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 允许或不允许选择与指定索引相关联的项目。

trans-unit.source: Allow single or multiple item selection. See the SELECT_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 允许选择单个或多个项目。请参见 SELECT_* 常量。

trans-unit.source: Allow single or multiple selection. See the SELECT_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 允许单选或多选。请参见 SELECT_* 常量。

trans-unit.source: Allows editing a collision polygon’s vertices on a selected plane. Can also set a depth perpendicular to that plane. This class is only available in the editor. It will not appear in the scene tree at runtime. Creates a Shape for gameplay. Properties modified during gameplay will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 允许在选定平面上编辑碰撞多边形的顶点。也可以设置垂直于该平面的深度。此类仅在编辑器中可用。运行时它将不会出现在场景树中。为游戏创建形状。在游戏过程中修改的属性将无效。

trans-unit.source: Allows editing a collision polygon's vertices on a selected plane. Can also set a depth perpendicular to that plane. This class is only available in the editor. It will not appear in the scene tree at run-time. Creates a Shape for gameplay. Properties modified during gameplay will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 允许在选定平面上编辑碰撞多边形的顶点。也可以设置垂直于该平面的深度。此类仅在编辑器中可用。运行时它不会出现在场景树中。创建游戏的形状。在游戏过程中修改的属性将无效。

trans-unit.source: Allows frequencies other than the cutoff_hz to pass.
trans-unit.target: 允许除cutoff_hz以外的频率通过。

trans-unit.source: Allows modulation of pitch independently of tempo. All frequencies can be increased/decreased with minimal effect on transients.
trans-unit.target: 允许独立于速度的音调调制。所有频率都可以增加/减少,而对瞬态的影响最小。

trans-unit.source: Allows or disallows selection of the item associated with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 允许或不允许选择与指定索引相关联的项目。

trans-unit.source: Allows or forbids rotation on one or more axes, depending on the RotationMode constants being used.
trans-unit.target: 根据所使用的RotationMode常数，允许或禁止在一个或多个轴上旋转。

trans-unit.source: Allows scaling the speed of the animation (or reversing it) in any children nodes. Setting it to 0 will pause the animation.
trans-unit.target: 允许在任何子节点中缩放动画的速度(或反转)。将其设置为0将暂停动画。

trans-unit.source: Allows single or multiple item selection. See the SelectMode constants.
trans-unit.target: 允许选择单个或多个项目。请参见SelectMode常量。

trans-unit.source: Allows single or multiple selection. See the SelectMode constants.
trans-unit.target: 允许单选或多选。请参见SelectMode常量。

trans-unit.source: Allows the user to record sound from a microphone. It sets and gets the format in which the audio file will be recorded (8-bit, 16-bit, or compressed). It checks whether or not the recording is active, and if it is, records the sound. It then returns the recorded sample.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户从麦克风录制声音。它设置并获取音频文件的录制格式(8位、16位或压缩)。它检查录音是否处于活动状态,如果处于活动状态,则记录声音。然后它返回录制的样本。

trans-unit.source: Allows the window to be resizable by default.
trans-unit.target: 允许在默认情况下调整窗口的大小。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to adjust the scale to your game’s units. Most AR/VR platforms assume a scale of 1 game world unit = 1 meter in the real world.
trans-unit.target: 使您可以根据游戏单位调整比例。大多数AR / VR平台假定现实世界中的比例为1个游戏世界单位= 1米。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to adjust the scale to your game's units. Most AR/VR platforms assume a scale of 1 game world unit = 1 real world meter.
trans-unit.target: 允许你根据游戏的单位调整比例。大多数AR/VR平台假设的比例是1个游戏世界单位=1个现实世界米。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to read and safely modify the simulation state for the object. Use this instead of Node._physics_process if you need to directly change the body’s position or other physics properties. By default, it works in addition to the usual physics behavior, but custom_integrator allows you to disable the default behavior and write custom force integration for a body.
trans-unit.target: 允许您阅读并安全地修改对象的仿真状态。如果您需要直接更改物体的 position 或其他物理属性，请使用它代替Node._physics_process。默认情况下，它除了通常的物理行为外还可以工作，但是custom_integrator允许您禁用默认行为并为物体编写自定义力积分。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to read and safely modify the simulation state for the object. Use this instead of Node._physics_process if you need to directly change the body's position or other physics properties. By default, it works in addition to the usual physics behavior, but custom_integrator allows you to disable the default behavior and write custom force integration for a body.
trans-unit.target: 允许您阅读并安全地修改对象的仿真状态。如果您需要直接更改物体的 position 或其他物理属性，请使用它代替Node._physics_process。默认情况下，它除了通常的物理行为外还可以工作，但是custom_integrator允许您禁用默认行为并为物体编写自定义力积分。

trans-unit.source: Alpha value (range 0 to 1).
trans-unit.target: 阿尔法值(范围0至1)。

trans-unit.source: Alpha value (range 0 to 255).
trans-unit.target: 阿尔法值(范围0~255)。

trans-unit.source: Alpha-blends src_rect from src image to this image at coordinates dest.
trans-unit.target: 在坐标 dest 处将 src_rect 从 src 图像混合到此图像。

trans-unit.source: Alpha-blends src_rect from src image to this image using mask image at coordinates dst. Alpha channels are required for both src and mask. dst pixels and src pixels will blend if the corresponding mask pixel’s alpha value is not 0. src image and mask image must have the same size (width and height) but they can have different formats.
trans-unit.target: 使用坐标为 dst 的 mask 图像将 src_rect 从 src 图像混合到此图像。 src 和 mask 都需要Alpha通道。如果相应的遮罩像素的alpha值不为0，则 dst 像素和 src 像素将混合 src 图像和 mask 图像必须具有相同的大小（宽度和高度），但是可以具有不同的格式。

trans-unit.source: Alpha-blends src_rect from src image to this image using mask image at coordinates dst. Alpha channels are required for both src and mask. dst pixels and src pixels will blend if the corresponding mask pixel's alpha value is not 0. src image and mask image must have the same size (width and height) but they can have different formats.
trans-unit.target: 使用坐标为 dst 的 mask 图像将 src_rect 从 src 图像混合到此图像。 src 和 mask 都需要Alpha通道。如果相应的遮罩像素的alpha值不为0，则 dst 像素和 src 像素将混合 src 图像和 mask 图像必须具有相同的大小（宽度和高度），但是可以具有不同的格式。

trans-unit.source: AlphaCutMode
trans-unit.target: AlphaCutMode

trans-unit.source: AlphaMode
trans-unit.target: AlphaMode

trans-unit.source: Also known as 9-slice panels, NinePatchRect produces clean panels of any size, based on a small texture. To do so, it splits the texture in a 3×3 grid. When you scale the node, it tiles the texture's sides horizontally or vertically, the center on both axes but it doesn't scale or tile the corners.
trans-unit.target: NinePatchRect也称为9切片面板，它基于较小的纹理生成任何大小的干净面板。为此，它将纹理分成3×3的网格。缩放节点时，它会水平或垂直地平铺纹理的侧面，两个轴的中心，但不会缩放或平铺角。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the edited scene must have a root node.
trans-unit.target: 同时注意,编辑后的场景必须有一个根节点。

trans-unit.source: Also, viewports can be assigned to different screens in case the devices have multiple screens.
trans-unit.target: 另外,在设备有多个屏幕的情况下,可以将视口分配到不同的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, a constant linear or angular velocity can be set for the static body, so even if it doesn’t move, it affects other bodies as if it was moving (this is useful for simulating conveyor belts or conveyor wheels).
trans-unit.target: 另外，可以为静态物体设置恒定的线速度或角速度，因此即使它不移动，它也会像移动一样影响其他物体（这对模拟传送带或传送轮很有用）。

trans-unit.source: Amount how much the filter affects the loudness, in dB.
trans-unit.target: 滤波器对响度的影响程度,单位为dB。

trans-unit.source: Amount of spread in Y/Z plane. A value of 1 restricts particles to X/Z plane.
trans-unit.target: 在Y / Z平面上的扩展量。值为 1 会将粒子限制在X / Z平面上。

trans-unit.source: Amount of spread in Y/Z plane. A value of 1 restricts particles to X/Z plane. Default 0.
trans-unit.target: 在Y / Z平面上的扩展量。值为 1 会将粒子限制在X / Z平面上。默认值 0 。

trans-unit.source: Amount of spread in Y/Z plane. A value of 1 restricts particles to X/Z plane.
trans-unit.target: 在Y / Z平面上的扩展量。值为 1 会将粒子限制在X / Z平面上。

trans-unit.source: Amount of spread in Y/Z plane. A value of 1 restricts particles to X/Z plane. Default 0.
trans-unit.target: 在Y / Z平面上的扩展量。值为 1 会将粒子限制在X / Z平面上。默认值 0 。

trans-unit.source: Amount of amplification in decibels. Positive values make the sound louder, negative values make it quieter. Value can range from -80 to 24.
trans-unit.target: 以分贝为单位的放大量。正值使声音更响亮,负值使声音更安静。数值范围从-80到24。

trans-unit.source: Amount of amplification. Positive values make the sound louder, negative values make it quieter. Value can range from -80 to 24. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 扩增量。正值使声音更大，负值使声音更安静。值的范围可以从-80到24。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.source: Amount of boost in the frequency range near the cutoff frequency.
trans-unit.target: 靠近截止频率的频率范围内的提升量。

trans-unit.source: Amount of boost in the overtones near the cutoff frequency.
trans-unit.target: 在截止频率附近的泛音的提升量。

trans-unit.source: Amount of compression applied to the audio once it passes the threshold level. The higher the ratio the more the loud parts of the audio will be compressed. Value can range from 1 to 48. Default value: 4.
trans-unit.target: 音频通过阈值级别后应用于音频的压缩量。比率越高，音频的大声部分将被压缩的越多。值的范围可以从1到48。默认值： 4 。

trans-unit.source: Amount of compression applied to the audio once it passes the threshold level. The higher the ratio, the more the loud parts of the audio will be compressed. Value can range from 1 to 48.
trans-unit.target: 音频通过阈值水平后应用于音频的压缩量。比率越高,音频的大声部分将被压缩。数值范围从1到48。

trans-unit.source: Amount of energy contribution from the ground.
trans-unit.target: 来自地面的能量贡献量;

trans-unit.source: Amount of energy contribution from the sky.

trans-unit.source: Amount of energy contribution from the sun.
trans-unit.target: 来自太阳的能量贡献量;

trans-unit.source: Amount of extra bias for shadow splits that are far away. If self shadowing occurs only on the splits far away, this value can fix them.
trans-unit.target: 远处影子分割的额外偏移量。如果自影只发生在远处的分割上,这个值可以修复它们。

trans-unit.source: Amount of extra bias for shadow splits that are far away. If self-shadowing occurs only on the splits far away, increasing this value can fix them.
trans-unit.target: 远处的影子分割的额外偏移量。如果自影只发生在远处的分片上,增加这个值可以修复它们。

trans-unit.source: Amount of far blur.
trans-unit.target: 远期模糊的数量。

trans-unit.source: Amount of light that the fog transmits.
trans-unit.target: 雾的透光量。

trans-unit.source: Amount of near blur.

trans-unit.source: Amount of read ahead used by remote filesystem. Higher values decrease the effects of latency at the cost of higher bandwidth usage.
trans-unit.target: 远程文件系统使用的超前读数。值越高,延迟的影响越小,但带宽使用量越大。

trans-unit.source: Amount of sleeping between frames when the low-processor usage mode is enabled (in microseconds). Higher values will result in lower CPU usage.
trans-unit.target: 启用低处理器使用模式时,帧之间的休眠时间(微秒)。数值越高,CPU使用率越低。

trans-unit.source: Amount of sun that affects the fog rendering.
trans-unit.target: 影响雾气渲染的太阳量。

trans-unit.source: Amount of time each particle will exist.
trans-unit.target: 每个粒子存在的时间量。

trans-unit.source: Amount of time each particle will exist. Default value: 1.
trans-unit.target: 每个粒子将存在的时间量。默认值： 1 。

trans-unit.source: Amount of time in milliseconds to store in buffer while playing.
trans-unit.target: 播放时存储在缓冲区的时间,以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Amount of time to preprocess the particles before animation starts. Lets you start the animation some time after particles have started emitting.
trans-unit.target: 动画开始前预处理粒子的时间。让你在粒子开始发射后的一段时间内启动动画。

trans-unit.source: Amount that ambient occlusion affects lighting from lights. If 0, ambient occlusion only affects ambient light. If 1, ambient occlusion affects lights just as much as it affects ambient light. This can be used to impact the strength of the ambient occlusion effect, but typically looks unrealistic.
trans-unit.target: 环境光遮挡会影响灯光的量。如果为 0 ，则环境光遮挡仅影响环境光。如果为 1 ，则环境光遮挡对光线的影响与对环境光的影响一样多。这可以用来影响环境光遮挡效果的强度，但是通常看起来是不现实的。

trans-unit.source: Amount to multiply the uv coordinates when using a texture. Larger values make the texture smaller, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 使用 texture 时，乘以 uv 坐标的数量。值越大，纹理越小，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Amount to offset alternating tiles. See HalfOffset for possible values.

trans-unit.source: An InputEvent can then be added to this action with action_add_event.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用action_add_event将InputEvent添加到该操作中。

trans-unit.source: An id can optionally be provided, as well as an accelerator (accel). If no id is provided, one will be created from the index. If no accel is provided then the default 0 will be assigned to it. See get_item_accelerator for more info on accelerators.
trans-unit.target: 一个 id 可以可选地被提供，以及作为促进剂（ accel ）。如果未提供 id ，则将从索引创建一个ID。如果未提供 accel 则将为其分配默认的 0 。有关加速器的更多信息，请参见get_item_accelerator。

trans-unit.source: An id can optionally be provided. If no id is provided, one will be created from the index.
trans-unit.target: 一个 id 可以可选地被提供。如果未提供 id ，则将从索引创建一个ID。

trans-unit.source: An Animation resource contains data used to animate everything in the engine. Animations are divided into tracks, and each track must be linked to a node. The state of that node can be changed through time, by adding timed keys (events) to the track.
trans-unit.target: 动画资源包含了用于动画引擎中一切的数据。动画被分为若干轨道,每个轨道必须链接到一个节点。通过向轨道添加定时键(事件),该节点的状态可以通过时间来改变。

trans-unit.source: An Omnidirectional light is a type of Light that emits light in all directions. The light is attenuated by distance and this attenuation can be configured by changing its energy, radius, and attenuation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 全向光的类型的光发射在所有方向上的光。光会被距离衰减，并且可以通过更改其能量，半径和衰减参数来配置此衰减。

trans-unit.source: An X509 certificate (e.g. for SSL).
trans-unit.target: X509证书(如SSL)。

trans-unit.source: An abstraction of a serialized scene.
trans-unit.target: 一个序列化场景的抽象。

trans-unit.source: An anchor point in AR space.
trans-unit.target: AR空间的一个锚点。

trans-unit.source: An animation player is used for general purpose playback of Animation resources. It contains a dictionary of animations (referenced by name) and custom blend times between their transitions. Additionally, animations can be played and blended in different channels.
trans-unit.target: 动画播放器用于动画资源的通用播放。它包含一个动画字典（按名称引用）和它们的过渡之间的自定义混合时间。此外，可以在不同的通道中播放和混合动画。

trans-unit.source: An animation player is used for general-purpose playback of Animation resources. It contains a dictionary of animations (referenced by name) and custom blend times between their transitions. Additionally, animations can be played and blended in different channels.
trans-unit.target: 动画播放器用于动画资源的通用播放。它包含一个动画字典（按名称引用）和它们的过渡之间的自定义混合时间。此外，可以在不同的通道中播放和混合动画。

trans-unit.source: An editor feature profile can be used to disable specific features of the Godot editor. When disabled, the features won't appear in the editor, which makes the editor less cluttered. This is useful in education settings to reduce confusion or when working in a team. For example, artists and level designers could use a feature profile that disables the script editor to avoid accidentally making changes to files they aren't supposed to edit.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器功能配置文件可以用来禁用Godot编辑器的特定功能。当禁用时,这些功能将不会出现在编辑器中,从而使编辑器不那么混乱。这在教育设置中很有用,以减少混乱或在团队中工作时。例如,艺术家和关卡设计师可以使用禁用脚本编辑器的功能配置文件,以避免意外地对他们不应该编辑的文件进行更改。

trans-unit.source: An editor feature profile which can be used to disable specific features.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器功能配置文件,可用于禁用特定功能。

trans-unit.source: An example expression text using the built-in math functions could be sqrt(pow(3,2) + pow(4,2)).
trans-unit.target: 使用内置数学函数的示例表达式文本可以是 sqrt(pow(3,2) + pow(4,2)) 。

trans-unit.source: An example of the relationship between binds passed to connect and parameters used when calling emit_signal:
trans-unit.target: 传递给connect的 binds 调用emit_signal时使用的参数之间的关系的示例：

trans-unit.source: An expression can be made of any arithmetic operation, built-in math function call, method call of a passed instance, or built-in type construction call.
trans-unit.target: 表达式可以由任何算术运算、内置数学函数调用、传递实例的方法调用或内置类型构造调用组成。

trans-unit.source: An expression in Godot Shading Language, which will be injected at the start of the graph's matching shader function (vertex, fragment, or light), and thus cannot be used to declare functions, varyings, uniforms, or global constants.
trans-unit.target: Godot着色语言的表达式，将在图形的匹配着色器功能（ vertex ， fragment 或 light ）的开始处注入，因此不能用于声明函数，变量，均值或全局常数。

trans-unit.source: An external library containing functions or script classes to use in Godot.
trans-unit.target: 一个外部库,包含Godot中使用的函数或脚本类。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of A* to find shortest paths among connected points in space.
trans-unit.target: A*的一个实现,用于寻找空间中连接点之间的最短路径。

trans-unit.source: An index of -1 clears the cell.
trans-unit.target: 索引 -1 清除单元格。

trans-unit.source: An infinite plane shape for 3D collisions. Note that the Plane's normal matters; anything "below" the plane will collide with it. If the PlaneShape is used in a PhysicsBody, it will cause colliding objects placed "below" it to teleport "above" the plane.
trans-unit.target: 用于3D碰撞的无限平面形状。注意飞机的正常情况；飞机“下方”的任何物体都将与其碰撞。如果在 PlaneShape 中使用了PlaneShape，则将导致放置在其“下方”的碰撞对象将其传送到平面“上方”。

trans-unit.source: An instance is a way of placing a 3D object in the scenario. Objects like particles, meshes, and reflection probes need to be associated with an instance to be visible in the scenario using instance_set_base.
trans-unit.target: 实例是在场景中放置3D对象的一种方式。样颗粒，网格，和反射探针对象需要被与实例相关联的是在使用该场景可见instance_set_base。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object represents a device that is tracked such as a controller or anchor point. HMDs aren’t represented here as they are fully handled internally.
trans-unit.target: 该对象的一个​​实例代表一个被跟踪的设备，例如控制器或锚点。HMD在这里未表示，因为它们在内部已完全处理。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object represents a device that is tracked, such as a controller or anchor point. HMDs aren't represented here as they are handled internally.
trans-unit.target: 这个对象的实例代表一个被跟踪的设备,如控制器或锚点。这里不代表HMD,因为它们由内部处理。

trans-unit.source: An instance stays linked to the original so when the original changes, the instance changes too.
trans-unit.target: 实例与原件保持链接,所以当原件改变时,实例也会改变。

trans-unit.source: An operator to be applied to the inputs. See Operator for options.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于输入的运算符。有关选项，请参见运算符。

trans-unit.source: An optional type_hint can be used to further specify the Resource type that should be handled by the ResourceFormatLoader.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 type_hint 可用于进一步指定应由ResourceFormatLoader处理的资源类型。

trans-unit.source: Anchors the bottom edge of the node to the origin, the center, or the end of its parent control. It changes how the bottom margin updates when the node moves or changes size. You can use one of the Anchor constants for convenience.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的底部边缘锚定到其父控件的原点，中心或末端。当节点移动或更改大小时，它会更改底部边距的更新方式。为了方便起见，可以使用Anchor常量之一。

trans-unit.source: Anchors the bottom edge of the node to the origin, the center, or the end of its parent control. It changes how the bottom margin updates when the node moves or changes size. You can use one of the ANCHOR_* constants for convenience. Default value: ANCHOR_BEGIN.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的底部边缘固定到其父控件的原点，中心或末端。它更改了节点移动或更改大小时底边距的更新方式。为了方便起见，可以使用 ANCHOR_* 常量之一。默认值：ANCHOR_BEGIN。

trans-unit.target: 将节点的左边缘锚定到其父控件的原点，中心或末端。当节点移动或更改大小时，它会更改左侧边距的更新方式。为了方便起见，可以使用 ANCHOR_* 常量之一。默认值：ANCHOR_BEGIN。

trans-unit.source: Animates method of object from the value returned by initial_method to final_val for duration seconds, delay seconds later. Methods are animated by calling them with consecutive values.
trans-unit.target: 动画 method 的 object 从返回的值由 initial_method 到 final_val 为 duration 秒， delay 秒后。通过使用连续值调用方法来使方法具有动画效果。

trans-unit.source: Animates property of object from initial_val to final_val for duration seconds, delay seconds later. Setting the initial value to null uses the current value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 动画 property 的 object 从 initial_val 到 final_val 为 duration 秒， delay 秒后。将初始值设置为 null 会使用属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Animates property of object from the current value of the initial_val property of initial to final_val for duration seconds, delay seconds later.
trans-unit.target: 动画 property 的 object 从当前值 initial_val 的属性 initial 到 final_val 为 duration 秒， delay 以后秒。

trans-unit.target: 动画偏移随机率。

trans-unit.source: Animation offset randomness ratio. Default value: 0.
trans-unit.target: 动画偏移随机率。默认值： 0 。

trans-unit.source: Animation speed in frames per second. This value defines the default time interval between two frames of the animation, and thus the overall duration of the animation loop based on the frames property. A value of 0 means no predefined number of frames per second, the animation will play according to each frame’s frame delay (see set_frame_delay). Default value: 4.
trans-unit.target: 动画速度，以每秒帧数为单位。该值定义了两个动画帧之间的默认时间间隔，并因此定义了基于frames属性的动画循环的总持续时间。值为0表示每秒没有预定义的帧数，动画将根据每个帧的帧延迟播放（请参阅set_frame_delay）。默认值：4。

trans-unit.source: Animation speed in frames per second. This value defines the default time interval between two frames of the animation, and thus the overall duration of the animation loop based on the frames property. A value of 0 means no predefined number of frames per second, the animation will play according to each frame's frame delay (see set_frame_delay).
trans-unit.target: 动画速度，以每秒帧数为单位。该值定义了两个动画帧之间的默认时间间隔，并因此定义了基于frames属性的动画循环的总持续时间。值为0表示每秒没有预定义的帧数，动画将根据每个帧的帧延迟播放（请参阅set_frame_delay）。

trans-unit.source: Animations are created using a SpriteFrames resource, which can be configured in the editor via the SpriteFrames panel.
trans-unit.target: 使用SpriteFrames资源创建动画，可以在编辑器中通过SpriteFrames面板对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Animations are just data containers, and must be added to nodes such as an AnimationPlayer or AnimationTreePlayer to be played back.
trans-unit.target: 动画只是数据容器，必须将其添加到诸如AnimationPlayer或AnimationTreePlayer之类的节点才能播放。

trans-unit.source: Animations are just data containers, and must be added to nodes such as an AnimationPlayer or AnimationTreePlayer to be played back. Animation tracks have different types, each with its own set of dedicated methods. Check TrackType to see available types.
trans-unit.target: 动画只是数据容器，必须将其添加到诸如AnimationPlayer或AnimationTreePlayer之类的节点才能播放。动画轨道有不同的类型，每种都有自己的专用方法集。检查TrackType以查看可用的类型。

trans-unit.source: Anti Aliasing draws a small ring around edges. This ring fades to transparent. As a result edges look much smoother. This is only noticeable when using rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: 抗锯齿会在边缘画一个小环。这个圆环会渐渐变成透明的。因此,边缘看起来更加平滑。这只有在使用圆角时才会明显。

trans-unit.source: Antialiasing draws a small ring around the edges, which fades to transparency. As a result, edges look much smoother. This is only noticeable when using rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: 反锯齿在边缘画了一个小环,并渐渐变成透明。因此,边缘看起来更加平滑。这只有在使用圆角时才会明显。

trans-unit.source: Any CanvasItem can draw. For this, update must be called, then NOTIFICATION_DRAW will be received on idle time to request redraw. Because of this, canvas items don't need to be redrawn on every frame, improving the performance significantly. Several functions for drawing on the CanvasItem are provided (see draw_* functions). However, they can only be used inside the Object._notification, signal or _draw virtual functions.
trans-unit.target: 任何 CanvasItem 都可以绘制。为此，必须调用更新，然后将在空闲时间收到NOTIFICATION_DRAW以请求重画。因此，不需要在每一帧上重新绘制画布项目，从而显着提高了性能。提供了一些用于在 CanvasItem 上进行绘制的函数（请参见 draw_* 函数）。但是，它们只能在Object._notification，signal或_draw虚拟函数内部使用。

trans-unit.source: Any CanvasItem can draw. For this, update must be called, then NOTIFICATION_DRAW will be received on idle time to request redraw. Because of this, canvas items don’t need to be redrawn on every frame, improving the performance significantly. Several functions for drawing on the CanvasItem are provided (see draw_* functions). However, they can only be used inside the Object._notification, signal or _draw virtual functions.
trans-unit.target: 任何CanvasItem都可以绘制。为此，必须调用更新，然后在空闲时间会收到NOTIFICATION_DRAW来请求重画。因此，不需要在每一帧上重新绘制画布项目，从而显着提高了性能。提供了一些用于在CanvasItem上进行绘制的函数（请参见 draw_* 函数）。但是，它们只能在Object._notification，signal或_draw虚拟函数内部使用。

trans-unit.source: As long as the snap vector is in contact with the ground, the body will remain attached to the surface. This means you must disable snap in order to jump, for example. You can do this by setting snap to (0, 0) or by using move_and_slide instead.
trans-unit.target: 只要 snap 矢量与地面接触，物体就会保持附着在地面上。例如，这意味着您必须禁用捕捉才能跳转。您可以通过将 snap 设置为 (0, 0) 或使用move_and_slide来实现。

trans-unit.target: 只要 snap 矢量与地面接触，物体就会保持附着在地面上。例如，这意味着您必须禁用捕捉才能跳转。您可以通过将snap设置为（0，0，0）或使用move_and_slide来做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: As one of the most important classes, the SceneTree manages the hierarchy of nodes in a scene as well as scenes themselves. Nodes can be added, retrieved and removed. The whole scene tree (and thus the current scene) can be paused. Scenes can be loaded, switched and reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 作为最重要的类之一， SceneTree 管理场景中节点的层次结构以及场景本身。可以添加，检索和删除节点。整个场景树（以及当前场景）都可以暂停。可以加载，切换和重新加载场景。

trans-unit.source: Assigns a value to the specified key of the specified section. If the section and/or the key do not exist, they are created. Passing a null value deletes the specified key if it exists, and deletes the section if it ends up empty once the key has been removed.

trans-unit.source: Assuming that the matrix is a proper rotation matrix (orthonormal matrix with determinant +1), return Euler angles (in the YXZ convention: first Z, then X, and Y last). Returned vector contains the rotation angles in the format (X-angle, Y-angle, Z-angle).
trans-unit.target: 假设矩阵是正交旋转矩阵(行列式+1的正交矩阵),返回Euler角(按YXZ惯例:先Z,再X,最后Y)。返回的向量包含格式为(X角、Y角、Z角)的旋转角。

trans-unit.source: Assuming that the matrix is a proper rotation matrix, slerp performs a spherical-linear interpolation with another rotation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 假设该矩阵是一个合适的旋转矩阵,slerp与另一个旋转矩阵进行球面直线插值。

trans-unit.source: Assuming that the matrix is the combination of a rotation and scaling, return the absolute value of scaling factors along each axis.
trans-unit.target: 假设矩阵是旋转和缩放的组合,返回沿各轴缩放系数的绝对值。

trans-unit.source: At -1, Output is input b-.
trans-unit.target: 在-1时,输出为输入b-。

trans-unit.source: At -1, output is input B-. From -1 to 0, the influence of B- gets lessened, the influence of A gets raised and the influence of B+ is 0. At 0, output is input A. From 0 to 1, the influence of A gets lessened, the influence of B+ gets raised and the influence of B+ is 0. At 1, output is input B+.
trans-unit.target: 在-1时,输出为输入B-。从-1到0,B-的影响变小,A的影响变大,B+的影响为0.在0时,输出为输入A.从0到1,A的影响变小,B+的影响变大,B+的影响为0.在1时,输出为输入B+。

trans-unit.source: At 0, Output is input a.
trans-unit.target: 0时,输出为输入a。

trans-unit.source: At 0, output is input A. Towards 1, the influence of A gets lessened, the influence of B gets raised. At 1, output is input B.
trans-unit.target: 0时,输出为输入A,向1时,A的影响变小,B的影响变大。在1时,输出为输入B。

trans-unit.source: At 1, Output is input b+.
trans-unit.target: 1时,输出为输入b+。

trans-unit.source: At 1, Output is input b.
trans-unit.target: 1时,输出为输入b。

trans-unit.source: AudioEffectEQ
trans-unit.target: AudioEffectEQ

trans-unit.source: AudioEffectEQ gives you control over frequencies. Use it to compensate for existing deficiencies in audio. AudioEffectEQ are very useful on the Master Bus to completely master a mix and give it character. They are also very useful when a game is run on a mobile device, to adjust the mix to that kind of speakers (it can be added but disabled when headphones are plugged).
trans-unit.target: AudioEffectEQ让你控制频率。用它来弥补音频中现有的不足。AudioEffectEQ在Master Bus上非常有用,可以完全掌握一个混音,并赋予它个性。当游戏在移动设备上运行时,它们也非常有用,可以将混音调整到那种扬声器上(可以添加,但在插入耳机时禁用)。

trans-unit.source: AudioEffectEQ gives you control over frequencies. Use it to compensate for existing deficiencies in audio. AudioEffectEQs are useful on the Master bus to completely master a mix and give it more character. They are also useful when a game is run on a mobile device, to adjust the mix to that kind of speakers (it can be added but disabled when headphones are plugged).
trans-unit.target: AudioEffectEQ让你控制频率。用它来弥补音频中现有的不足。AudioEffectEQ在Master总线上很有用,可以完全掌握一个混音,并赋予它更多的特性。当游戏在移动设备上运行时,它们也很有用,可以将混音调整到那种扬声器上(可以添加,但在插入耳机时禁用)。

trans-unit.source: Baked lightmaps
trans-unit.target: 烘托的光图

trans-unit.source: Baked lightmaps are an alternative workflow for adding indirect (or baked) lighting to a scene. Unlike the GIProbe approach, baked lightmaps work fine on low-end PCs and mobile devices as they consume almost no resources in run-time.
trans-unit.target: 烘焙光照贴图是向场景添加间接（或烘焙）光照的替代工作流程。与GIProbe方法不同，烘焙的光照贴图在低端PC和移动设备上可以正常运行，因为它们在运行时几乎不占用任何资源。

trans-unit.source: BakedLightmap
trans-unit.target: BakedLightmap

trans-unit.source: BakedLightmapData
trans-unit.target: BakedLightmapData

trans-unit.source: Bakes the effect from all GeometryInstances marked with GeometryInstance.use_in_baked_light and Lights marked with either Light.BAKE_INDIRECT or Light.BAKE_ALL. If create_visual_debug is true, after baking the light, this will generate a MultiMesh that has a cube representing each solid cell with each cube colored to the cell's albedo color. This can be used to visualize the GIProbe's data and debug any issues that may be occurring.
trans-unit.target: 烘烤从所有的效果GeometryInstance小号标有GeometryInstance.use_in_baked_light和轻小号标有任一Light.BAKE_INDIRECT或Light.BAKE_ALL。如果 create_visual_debug 为 true ，则在烘烤光之后，将生成一个MultiMesh，该MultiMesh具有一个多维数据集，该多维数据集代表每个实体单元，每个多维数据集的颜色都与该单元的反照率颜色相同。这可用于可视化 GIProbe 的数据并调试可能发生的任何问题。

trans-unit.source: Bakes the lightmaps within the currently edited scene.
trans-unit.target: 在当前编辑的场景中烘焙光斑。

trans-unit.source: Bakes the lightmaps within the currently edited scene. Returns a BakeError to signify if the bake was successful, or if unsuccessful, how the bake failed.
trans-unit.target: 在当前编辑的场景中烘焙光照贴图。返回一个BakeError，以指示烘焙是否成功，或者如果失败，则如何烘焙失败。

trans-unit.source: Base class for 3D texture types.
trans-unit.target: 3D纹理类型的基础类。

trans-unit.source: Base class for Texture3D and TextureArray. Cannot be used directly, but contains all the functions necessary for accessing and using Texture3D and TextureArray. Data is set on a per-layer basis. For Texture3Ds, the layer specifies the depth or Z-index, they can be treated as a bunch of 2D slices. Similarly, for TextureArrays, the layer specifies the array layer.
trans-unit.target: Texture3D和TextureArray的基类。不能直接使用，但包含访问和使用Texture3D和TextureArray所需的所有功能。数据是按层设置的。对于Texture3D，该层指定深度或Z索引，可以将它们视为一堆2D切片。同样，对于TextureArray，该图层指定数组图层。

trans-unit.source: Base class for all UI-related nodes. Control features a bounding rectangle that defines its extents, an anchor position relative to its parent control or the current viewport, and margins that represent an offset to the anchor. The margins update automatically when the node, any of its parents, or the screen size change.
trans-unit.target: 所有与UI相关的节点的基类。 Control 具有定义其范围的边界矩形，相对于其父控件或当前视口的锚点位置以及表示锚点偏移的边距。当节点，它的任何父节点或屏幕尺寸更改时，边距会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: Base class for all User Interface or UI related nodes. Control features a bounding rectangle that defines its extents, an anchor position relative to its parent control or the current viewport, and margins that represent an offset to the anchor. The margins update automatically when the node, any of its parents, or the screen size change.
trans-unit.target: 所有与用户界面或UI相关的节点的基类。 Control 具有定义其范围的边界矩形，相对于其父控件或当前视口的锚点位置以及代表锚点偏移的边距。当节点，其任何父节点或屏幕尺寸更改时，边距会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: Base class for all non built-in types.

trans-unit.source: Base class for all primitive meshes. Handles applying a Material to a primitive mesh. Examples include CapsuleMesh, CubeMesh, CylinderMesh, PlaneMesh, PrismMesh, QuadMesh, and SphereMesh.
trans-unit.target: 所有基本网格物体的基类。处理将“ 材质”应用到基本网格。示例包括CapsuleMesh，CubeMesh，CylinderMesh，PlaneMesh，PrismMesh，QuadMesh和SphereMesh。

trans-unit.source: Base class for audio streams. Audio streams are used for sound effects and music playback, and support WAV (via AudioStreamSample) and OGG (via AudioStreamOGGVorbis) file formats.
trans-unit.target: 音频流的基类。音频流用于声音效果和音乐播放，并支持WAV（通过AudioStreamSample）和OGG（通过AudioStreamOGGVorbis）文件格式。
